message: Bob, I believe this product holds immense value, and I'm confident it can greatly benefit your operations. I'm offering it to you for $1200000. This price reflects the product's worth and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its worth to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1000000 is still below the product's true value.  I'm willing to come down to $1100000, which reflects a significant compromise on my end.  I believe this price is still fair considering the product's potential for your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1100000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob,  I appreciate your continued interest. While I'm willing to negotiate, $950000 doesn't quite reflect the value this product will bring to your company. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000. This price is a significant compromise, but it still allows for a profitable transaction for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1050000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
